name: Technelegy p. 46: Glitch
description:
A digital broadside by Sasha Stiles (@sashastiles) based on “Glitch,” a poem first published by Always Crashing in 2019 and subsequently nominated for the Pushcart Prize and Best of the Net. This piece was created from a manuscript page proof; a still appears in the physical edition of Stiles’ book, Technelegy. 
Minted Oct. 2021 in an edition of 10 and offered jointly by Stiles (sashastiles.com) and the Black Spring Press Group (https://blackspringpressgroup.com/products/technelegy).
